to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."

relationships. Eric Schmidt and Page said the moves are intended to speed up decision making at the top of the Internet giant, which also posted strong fourth-quarter results. The management reshuffle has been brought about to streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said. Eric Schmidt oversaw a period of tremendous growth as chief executive for the past decade, as Google Inc. turned into a Web search-engine powerhouse with a complementary search-ad business

4. Eric Schmidt navigated the company past early doubts that it could build a successful ad business around a search engine. He also oversaw the 2004 initial public offering, the biggest for an Internet company. We view this as evidence of the founders staying fully engaged in the business-- a positive, said Mark Mahaney , an analyst at Citigroup Inc. in San Francisco. The company also posted fourth-quarter profit that topped analysts' estimates as businesses boosted online-ad spending. Google Inc. , based in Mountain View, California
